basics.name: Sourav Banerjee
basics.label: Computer Science Engineer
basics.summary: <center>Trying to make sense of the Data</center>

Personal Projects.company: Document Image Classification on RVL-CDIP Dataset
highlights: Detection of different types of Document images and classify them in different classes like letter, form, email, handwritten, advertisement, scientific report, scientific publication, specification, file folder, news article, budget, invoice, presentation, questionnaire, resume, memo. So It is a Multi-class Classification Problem or we can call it a Computer Vision task.
Tools used: Scikit-learn, Numpy, Seaborn, Pandas, Matplotlib, Keras with Tensorflow backend, Jupyter Notebook, Tensorboard.

Detection of different types of Toxic Comments and classify them in different classes like Toxic, Severe_Toxic, Obscene, Threat, Insult and Identity Hate. But a Single comment can be classified in multiple classes. So it is a Multilabel Classification Problem.
Tools used: Scikit-learn, Numpy, Seaborn, Pandas, Matplotlib, Jupyter Notebook, Keras with Tensorflow backend.

highlights: Detection of different types of Document images and classify them in different classes like letter, form, email, handwritten, advertisement, scientific report, scientific publication, specification, file folder, news article, budget, invoice, presentation, questionnaire, resume, memo. Tools used: Scikit-learn, Numpy, Seaborn, Pandas, Matplotlib, Keras with Tensorflow backend, Jupyter Notebook, Tensorboard.
